intro.description: This tutorial explains how to read detector data from data files

item.title: Selecting data files
item.description: Select single file or multiple files by holding SHIFT or CTRL keys in the project explorer view. Detectors present in all the selected files will only be loaded into NCD data reduction panel.

item.title: Read detector information
item.description: Data reduction process utilises three types of detectors: Calibration, WAXS and SAXS.

subitem.label: Right-click on the selected files to open pop-up menu.
Select NCD > Read Detector Information option from the pop-up menu.

Inspect detector names added into WAXS and SAXS combo boxes in "NCD Detector Parameters" view and into Normalisation Data combo box under "Reference data" field in "NCD Data Reduction Parameters" view.
